name: AALib - Asynchronous Action Library
short_description: AALib/PyAALib - Asynchronous Action Library Project - The project is a Framework based on Pure Object Oriented Concepts to develop asynchronous communication between threads (thread safety) and external process. Platforms: Windows, MacOSX, Linux,Sola
